definition: to throw/to toss/to fling/to cast/to abandon
to let go/to cast/to let loose/to discharge/to give expression to

sentences.english: The deformation and breakup of liquid droplet is important in fuel explosive dispersal.
sentences.chinese: 液滴變形和破碎是燃料拋撒問題的重要過程。

sentences.english: Flow characteristics of submunition dispensing simultaneously were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了子彈同時拋撒子母彈分離干擾氣動特性。

sentences.english: My job was to drop chaff.
sentences.chinese: 我的工作是拋撒干擾片。

sentences.english: The work principle of explosive cluster warhead dispense device is presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了爆炸型集束彈頭拋撒機構的工作原理。
